title: legendary border
body:
Question about the legendary border, do you need to own both the skin and the icon before the event ends for it to be active? or will it still activate if i buy the skin after the event ends , i ask since im a bit strapped for RP right now so cant afford the skins  (but with the missions i can get the icons for the border) right now outright but i would like the border for the login lobby once i actually can.


A red post would be appreciated in this

replies.body:
No need to drop that cash right now bud! You can buy the Border Icon now, then buy the skin after the event, and you will still have the border ^_^!

FYI: I'm not *quite* 100% sure, but I *have* been told those skins will be sticking around after the event ends.
If you could confirm this at any time today it would be awesome <3

Sorry for the slow reply! 

I've asked around to double check, and those two skins should not be leaving the shop when the event ends. They are not currently listed as limited skins, so they should stay in the shop.
